response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly enhance your needs and expectations. Given its high value and quality, I'm confident it could be a perfect fit for you. Considering its worth to me and its potential benefits to you, I propose a price of $120 for this exceptional item. This offer allows you to secure a valuable asset at a reasonable premium compared to its intrinsic value. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 120}
